授業目的: Students of both chemistry and non-chemistry majors are recommended to take this introductory course of physical chemistry. Physical chemistry is a fundamental but important subject related to various fields in science. In this class, students will learn from a brief introduction to quantum chemistry including its applications such as spectroscopy.
到達目標: Students should be able to have some basic knowledge of quantum chemistry and spectroscopy.
